cards.title: Scotland's UNESCO Trail
cards.description: The first country in the world to bring together 16 UNESCO sites into one trail. Are you ready to discover the wonders within?

cards.title: 15 Most beautiful places & beauty spots in Scotland
cards.description: Take a look and be blown away by the most beautiful places to visit in Scotland.

cards.title: Top tourist attractions & places to visit in Scotland
cards.description: Discover the best things to do in Scotland with our list of top 20 most visited tourist attractions.

cards.title: 9 Magical landmarks & attractions in Scotland
cards.description: Discover beautiful landmarks in Scotland, so magical you won't believe they're real! Including fairytale castles, stunning gardens, and more.

cards.title: Highland games in Scotland
cards.description: From the tug o' war to the caber toss, Scotland's Highland games are not to be missed.

cards.title: Edinburgh festivals
cards.description: Discover Edinburgh's summer festivals, including the world-famous Edinburgh International Festival and Edinburgh Festival Fringe.

cards.title: 16 Scottish music festivals in 2025
cards.description: Find out more about music festivals throughout the year including summer festivals, celebrating traditional music, pop, rock and alternative genres.

cards.title: 10 Great Scottish castles
cards.description: Discover 10 of Scotland's greatest castles and find out what makes them so iconic.

cards.title: Where to see Highland cows in Scotland
cards.description: One of the most sought-after Scottish experiences is meeting our hairy and loveable Highland cows. Or as we Scots call them, Highland coos!

cards.title: 15 Beautiful nature reserves to explore in Scotland
cards.description: It's time to get out on the road and discover (or rediscover!) some of the many nature reserves which Scotland has to offer.

cards.title: Scotland's national parks and natural heritage sites
cards.description: Explore the wild expanses of our national parks and national nature reserves and learn about how Scotland was formed in our Geoparks.
